text: Create an image of an anthropomorphised frog. The frog has endearing eyes peeking through the lenses of its swimming goggles. Given a comical twist, it is involved in a common human activity. Perhaps it is reading a newspaper, sitting complacently in an armchair, sipping from a mug of hot chocolate. The surroundings are typical of a comfortable human living room, with a touch of whimsy, befitting the unusual occupant.
